column2: As your companions pack your ships with the loot from [From.GetName], a young marauder comes to you. He tells you that he spotted a great spot to build a pirate den. Plenty of your other warriors want to stay here and continue ravaging the land after the rest of you return home.
Just keep the wine cold until my next visit.
A pirate den will be built in [scoped_province.GetName].

You are preparing to move on from [From.GetName] to the next settlement, when a [character_to_join_pirates.GetManWoman] runs past your guards to speak with you. [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHeCap] explains that [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHe] wants to join your forces and live like you. Some of your warriors start to smile behind [character_to_join_pirates.GetHerHim] as [character_to_join_pirates.GetSheHe] clearly doesn't know how hard your lives are.
You can come with us... as a prisoner.
Lead this fool back to [character_to_join_pirates.GetHerHis] people.
This is a shady place where pirates gather.
